page.title: 04ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: One{cinema}provides the public with popular film entertainment while{live {performances}(mainly amateur) can be seen at the{Assembly Rooms}and at venues arranged by{University {Societies.} {Poetry recitals}are often arranged and can be heard in{local public {houses}and on{University sites.} {Musical entertainment}is provided by the{Durham Light Opera Group,}the{ {Durham Singers' Choral Society} and the{Durham Youth Jazz Orchestra.} In addition there is a{Folk {Festival}and a {Music Festival}held each year.
